description: San Marino announced August 12 that citizens and residents returning from non-EU and Shengen Agreement countries, as well as Monaco, Vatican City, Andorra, and the UK must report their return to the Foreign Affairs department in advance. On arrival the individual must take a serological test and follow quarantine procedures if necessary.
type_sub_cat: Visa extensions (e.g. visa validity extended)
target_geog_level: One or more countries and one or more regional groupings

description: San Marino announced August 14 that individuals coming from "Bulgaria, Croatia, Greece, Malta, Romania and Spain or from countries other than the EU or Schengen countries," must report their arrival to the Department of Foreign Affairs and complete a diagnostic test within 48 hours of arrival. Self-isolation is required until a negative result is gained and if the test is positive quarantine measures will be put in place.
type_sub_cat: Visa extensions (e.g. visa validity extended)

description: San Marino announced August 12 that citizens and residents returning from non-EU and Shengen Agreement countries, as well as Monaco, Vatican City, Andorra, and the UK must report their return to the Foreign Affairs department in advance. On arrival the individual must take a serological test and follow quarantine procedures if necessary. UPDATE: The original restriction allowed individuals who came from the EU, Schengen Zone, UK, Monaco, Andorra, or Vatican City to enter without reporting to the Department of Foreign Affairs. As of August 14 "those coming from Bulgaria, Croatia, Greece, Malta, Romania and Spain or from countries other than the EU or Schengen countries," must report their re-entry to the Department of Foreign Affairs and report for testing within 48 hours of their arrival. Individuals must also remain in self-isolation until a negative test result is obtained.
type_sub_cat: Visa extensions (e.g. visa validity extended)
target_geog_level: One or more countries and one or more regional groupings

description: San Marino requires all people who entered the country after February 15th and have visited a risk area to contact the Health Department on the dedicated number.

description: San Marino extends the requirement to contact the Health Department to all travelers who visited risk areas after April 6.

description:
Translation: "San Marino citizens or residents who return from countries other than: a. Member States of the European Union b. States party to the Schengen Agreement c. United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland d. Andorra, the Principality of Monaco and the Vatican City State have the obligation to communicate their return to the Foreign Affairs Department in advance or, in the case of return for urgent reasons, to the Interforce Operations Center." This policy begins June 30.

Original: "I cittadini sammarinesi o residenti che rientrano da Paesi diversi da: a. Stati membri dell’Unione Europea b. Stati parte dell’Accordo Schengen c. Regno Unito di Gran Bretagna e Irlanda del Nord d. Andorra, Principato di Monaco e Stato della Città del Vaticano hanno l’obbligo di comunicare preventivamente il proprio rientro al Dipartimento Affari Esteri o, nel caso di rientro per motivi d’urgenza, alla Centrale Operativa Interforze"
type_sub_cat: NA
target_geog_level: One or more countries, but not all countries

description: San Marino is allowing health facilities that have not yet been able to open for procedures outside of "procedures for the reduction of the spread of Covid-19" will be allowed to open after an assessment that the facility is preventing the spread of COVID-19. Facilities will begin to have these assessments after May 31.
type_sub_cat: Other Health Infrastructure

description:
On July 9 the Social Security Institute of San Marino donated 3,000 masks and 100 protective suits to Brazil to help with the pandemic. 

Original: "3.000 mascherine e 100 tute protettive: è questa la piccola ma significativa donazione fatta dell'Istituto per la sicurezza sociale di San Marino alla Repubblica federale del Brasile."
type_sub_cat: Other Health Infrastructure
target_geog_level: One or more countries and one or more regional groupings

description:
Translation: Second tent set up outside the hospital

April 27, 2020  - Today a second tent has been set up outside the hospital, thanks to the contribution and interest of the Civil Protection of San Marino, always present in all phases of the health emergency; the tent will allow to double the molecular tests on the population of San Marino. 

Original: 
Allestita seconda tenda esterna all'Ospedale

27 Aprile 2020 - Oggi è stata montata una seconda tenda fuori dall’Ospedale, grazie al contributo e l’interessamento della Protezione Civile di San Marino, sempre presente in tutte le fasi dell’Emergenza sanitaria; la tenda consentirà di raddoppiare i test molecolari sulla popolazione di San Marino.
type_sub_cat: NA
enforcer: Ministry/Department of Health,Other (Please specify in the text box)

description: In San Marino the Secretariat of State for Education announced August 31 the establishment of a hotline for parents "to ask all questions on anti Covid practices in view of the resumption of school lessons." description: San Marino suspends private and public gatherings of all kinds and nature from February 23rd on.
type_sub_cat: Postponement of an annually recurring event

description: On March 1st San Marino extends ban on all public and private gatherings to March 8th.
type_sub_cat: Postponement of an annually recurring event

description: San Marino suspends all sport events, public or private, involving spectators from March 1st.
type_sub_cat: Postponement of an annually recurring event

description: San Marino extends ban on sport events involving spectators to April 6th.
type_sub_cat: Postponement of an annually recurring event

description: San Marino suspends all civil and religious celebrations, including weddings and funerals, from March 8th.
type_sub_cat: Postponement of an annually recurring event

description: San Marino, beginning March 8 all sporting events with spectators are banned indefinitely
type_sub_cat: Postponement of an annually recurring event

description: San Marino bans events and gatherings of any nature and kind, public or private from March 20th.
type_sub_cat: Postponement of an annually recurring event
compliance: Mandatory with Legal Penalties (Jail Time),Mandatory with Fines

description:
Translation: "Starting from 15 June 2020, all organized events, conferences, congresses, as well as events in public or private places, including those of a social, cultural, recreational, fair nature, are permitted, subject to compliance with the provisions of Annex 1 of this decree-law."

Original: "a partire dal 15 giugno 2020 sono consentite tutte le manifestazioni organizzate, i convegni, i congressi nonché gli eventi in luogo pubblico o privato ivi compresi quelli di carattere sociale, culturale, ludico, fieristico, fatto salvo il rispetto di quanto disposto all’Allegato 1 del presente decreto – legge. Restano sospese le attività di discoteche e locali assimilati."
type_sub_cat: Postponement of an annually recurring event

description:
On June 30, San Marino recommends wearing a mask if in a closed space or with vulnerable populations, this recommendation does not apply to children under 6, individuals with disabilities that are not compatible with wearing a mask, or if in the presence of cohabitants. 

Original: "E’fortemente raccomandato l’utilizzo delle mascherine protettive in luoghi chiusi.Particolare attenzione deve essere prestata quando ci si trova in presenza delle persone più fragili
ed esposte al virus quali anziani, disabili, persone immunodepresse o con comorbilità. Permane l’obbligo di indossare la mascherina ogni qualvolta non sia mantenuta la distanza interpersonale di almeno un metro per un periodo superiore ai 30 minuti, fatta eccezione per i
nuclei di conviventi, per i minori al di sotto di 6 anni nonché per i soggetti con forme di disabilità non compatibili con l’uso della mascherina."
type_sub_cat: Keeping a distance of at least 6 feet or 1.5 meters apart
target_geog_level: One or more countries, but not all countries

type_sub_cat: Wearing Masks in all public spaces/everywhere
